title: Chargrill Charlie's is giving out FREE chicken burgers after Melbourne Cup
text:
Chicken shop Chargrill Charlie's has created a 'Bloody Mary' burger for unlucky Australians to 'recover with' the day after the Melbourne Cup.

Those punters who fail to secure a win on bets made on races at the Melbourne Cup can head into one of the 13 stores across Sydney and Melbourne for a burger, so long as they keep their losing ticket.

Stacked with chicken, cheese, tomato, grilled onions, pickles, a fried egg and drizzled in homemade Bloody Mary Sauce the burger is meant to cure those who might have a heavy head the morning after.

Each customer can claim one Bloody Mary Burger per person with their 2019 losing betting ticket and the offer is available from the store opening until 5pm.

Diners can also purchase a bottle of the Bloody Mary Sauce to take home and keep on hand for next time they need that extra kick, packed with all of the 'hair of the dog' ingredients you expect from the cocktail remedy.

For those who booked the day off Chargrill Charlie's has created the Melbourne Cup Hangover Pack, available to pre-order before the event so you're prepared.

For those who booked the day off Chargrill Charlie's has created the Melbourne Cup Hangover Pack, available to pre-order before the event so you're prepared

Delivered straight to your door the Hangover Pack includes eight Bloody Mary burgers, a bottle of homemade Bloody Mary Sauce, devil wings and wedges for $150.00.

The chicken shop has been selling chemical and hormone-free chickens for decades and is a favourite among those who like a tasty hot chip-filled lunch.

The Melbourne Cup carnival will begin on November 2 with Derby Day, and the Cup itself will fall on the 5th followed by Oaks Day on November 7.
